name: KissManga - Modern
description: What's new? - I've made links that were difficult to click bigger. - Added a background to the header. - Change the logo. - Made mostly everything a light black / dark grey and Blueish

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch

additional_info: V1.0 (April 16th, 2018): ► "First" release. This was called KissManga - Material but I didn't think it fit that style so I renamed it KissManga - Modern and made it look like a website from our time.
